website_summaries.verdict: Though there are a few reported concerns, it is the best performing of its kind.
pros: An affordable alternative to traditional screen doors, this magnetic model has impressive quality for a reasonable price
It's not too difficult to put up and is guaranteed by the company to keep bugs out
cons: Some owners reported having to make adjustments during installation to prevent gaps
Velcro pieces occasionally have to be replaced due to loss of stickiness

website_summaries.verdict: This curtain door is a little heavier duty than others because it is made from a fiberglass material instead of polyester.
pros: Seals behind you and stays sealed
Magnets stay on well and do not fall off or break
Hook-and-loop closure backing holds the door in tightly
cons: It will not work well if not hung correctly
Must be straight or will not work

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted along with some great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product a couple months back and it had started to develop a hole at the bottom half of the panel (possibly caused by one of my small dogs so I will be using the "chip clip" idea seen in one of the other comments). I contacted the seller and they immediately responded without hesitation and sent me a replacement right away. I am very pleased with the product as well as the awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: jmenic

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought one of these a few years ago and it lasted pretty well. -- started to get faded and lose some of its magnetic ability, so I bought a replacement (I wanted to use the same company, since it was a good product). I am pretty disappointed. The magnets don't latch automatically - I have to physically close it for it to work. The magnets just aren't strong enough. I don't know what they changed, but it doesn't have magnets all the way down or in large sections. This one doesn't stay closed. I'm bummed and will likely return it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen. Okay quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Okay quality. The magnetic strip has already split on one side from normal wear, but it's still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Schiesser

customer_reviews.title: Now I can enjoy a breez without bugs getting in
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I love having my door open to watch my kids or just get a nice breeze going. Although it occasionally doesn’t latch when walking thru it’s not that hard to just gently push together for it to seal. And it only does that on occasion. Most of the time just seals right up after walking thru. I did have some problems with the adhesive initially but the seller sent me some addition Velcro and had no problem. Make sure to install on the outside of the doorframe. Was confusing when reading directions. Great product, would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Keep open if dog scratches at door!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this last July and made it about 7 months. When the door is closed my dog scratches to come in, and the screen ripped, a tiny hole in it. Once that happened the dogs paw kept getting caught in it and ripped it wide open. It worked great otherwise but planning on reordering one with a fiberglass mesh not polyester. I should have pulled the screen open while not in use in the winter to avoid the dog scratching at it, if I had I'm sure it would be fine today. Easy to install and the velcro stayed in place. Greatest product idea ever!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Spangler

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: After having the toddler push the screen out of our sliding door a million times, we resorted to this temporary solution. It does what it says it will do. However, I wish I would have known to put it up about 3 inches higher. It drags on the ground and you have to duck a bit to go through it. Raising it up would have put the Velcro on the exterior siding of the house instead of the door frame, but at least it wouldn't drag. It will work fine until we can reinstall the sliding screen door.
customer_reviews.author: fdjnl

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd one we’ve purchased. I looked at our past purchases and it looks like we replace it about every two years which I think is more than fair for the price. It seals up correctly every time. I will say you have to have someone very precise hang it, if anything is crooked or unlevel I don’t think it would work as well. We use it for the back door in the spring/fall to leave the door open and with a dog constantly in and out at other times of the year it keeps the bugs from coming in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This works great for my back door. I prefer to leave the door open on a nice day or to let dogs in an out all day, but bugs will pour in the second I open the door. This allows be to keep the door open and not have any bugs get in. The dogs can easily open it and the magnets close behind them. The mesh fabric does tear a little easy thouh. We are on our 4th one. We also have 6 dogs who run in and out of it all day. For this price it’s not bad to just buy and replace when needed. Does the trick for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig E.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought this about 3 & 1/2 years ago. Just now needing to replace it after a little one in the family pulled on it. The main downside, which really isn't a huge deal breaker, is that if you need to go in or out with a large box or similar, you might wind up tearing the attachment point in the middle at the top. This happened to us a few times over the years, and all we did was sew it up with some heavy duty thread. This screen is easy to install and very effective at keeping the bugs out while letting the breeze come through.
customer_reviews.author: We5inelgr

customer_reviews.title: Good for people, not sturdy enough for dogs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this. But the original item lasted 4 days and then as my dog went through the screen the mesh tore from the magnet. The company responded very quickly and sent a replacement right away. After about a week the same thing happened at the exact same spot. So, while customer service is good and the product might be fine for people, it's not good for dogs. Sadly, I'm beyond the return window and I'm out $30. Update: the company contacted me and refunded my money. Such great customer service! If you’re thinking of getting this for people or small dogs, it’s a great product, with great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I hung this in my balcony door. I just hung it my way with extra nails. Easy to do. The mesh is strong material. The magnets are powerful. Looks good and not distracting and does a great job of keeping insects out. But the true test is toddlers pulling on it and going in and out...and still has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we'll see if the 2nd one lasts
customer_reviews.text: purchased this and had up for few weeks before it got a hole in (assuming from one of my dogs) and next thing I know one of the dogs went running outside and took one half with him, completely off and we used screws to help secure. His paw may have gotten stuck in the whole, don't know. SO, I purchased another and will be putting up today and we will see if it lasts longer that a few weeks. There are cheaper options with these but I liked how it seemed a bit more durable so could have been just a fluke, fingers crossed!! if it doesn't last through at least the summer, will not be buying a 3rd.~
customer_reviews.author: PamPam

customer_reviews.title: hidden magnets
customer_reviews.text: This is our second magnetic screen. I like how the magnets are hidden in the seam. Our previous one had to be replaced because the magnets popped off. Comes with yellow thumb tacks which is annoying since it is black, but they work. We had way to much velcro left because we have wood trim on the top and side. With 3 kids and a dog, this is working great so far. Took only a few minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of Flies and Insects
customer_reviews.text: I stay in the ground floor and in summer i face lot of problems with the house flies.. Once they're into the house its almost dificult to handle them. and i dont like the sprays that are avaliable as some how i feel they effect my skin.. So i felt tbis net is the best option.. Installation is very much easy and can be do e in 10 minutes with the help of the video they provide.. But please make sure you choose the correct size before your order else that total effort will be wasted.. Its almost 3 to 4 days and I am tension free from flies and insects i to my room.. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Kranthi

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Functions great! Kids and dog will breeze through and snaps shut behind. Can easily use closepins to hold open sometimes, or pull off velcro. Hold up decently: My screen wore out after 2 years (in direct Florida sun), but was easy to pull of and replace because of the velcro. The second screen I purchased needed to add a little stitching at the top to keep it from gaping and to reinforce it. After that, it also held for 2 years. Now getting ready to replace it again. I think that a reasonable amount of time to hold up in direct sun and am happy with how easy it is to replace.
customer_reviews.author: CS.Archer

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but doesn't hold up after just 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it more stars. The first 2 months I would've given it a 5 star review because of the convenience of it and how well it worked. But the bottom completely fell apart and wore out after just 3-4 months. I'll be purchasing another one but unfortunately will have to go with a different brand in hopes of finding more durability. My dog never paws at the door when she's outside, she just sits patiently until someone sees her waiting so I can't even blame her for ripping it up.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Stitching unraveled
customer_reviews.text: Poor durability. Everything installed easily and looked good. Appeared to be made well...unfortunately on the 4th time through the stitched in the center where the split is sewn in at the top broke the stitching and started to unravel. Only one stitch through it that appears to be more for the velcro than anything. Now magnets won't connect. If you can sew then give it a try and you'll have to enforce like I did. If you can't reinforce this stitch you should try a better product.
customer_reviews.author: dezignz by mz

customer_reviews.title: Really great for kids, and keeping bugs out.
customer_reviews.text: Love this screen! It's really satisfying to hear it snap closed behind you after you walk through it and is really great when you want to leave the door open for your kids without bugs getting in. Unfortunately for me, my laundry room door is metal so the magnets get stuck to my door occasionally, but it's easy to just reach down and flip them back off. Just be aware of any metal (doors, washing machine, etc.) near your screen that it could get stuck too. The velcro holds very well, and the screen seems like great quality. I'd buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Screen - 2nd time around!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this screen. I just installed our second one. Our first lasted several years with heavy duty use, dogs, kids, etc barreling through it non-stop, I think it would have lasted a lot longer, but our dog is a "scratcher" and eventually scratched holes in the bottom. That said, I'm amazed at how long it held up under that abuse. You won't go wrong with this product. A neighbor who had spent a lot of money on a disappearing screen for his house commented on how he wished he had gotten the iGotTech Magnetic Screen instead. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this product and this company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: A product that actually does what it claims to
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the magnetic screen door because I live in Florida and spend a lot of time on my patio, plus, I am disabled and walk with a cane. A person who uses a cane loses the use of one hand by default. Then if there is anything to carry, the person with the cane has no hands to use. Therefore, the iGotTech magnetic screen door is perfect for me. I can move freely to and from my patio. The product itself is durable and was easy to install, exactly as advertised. It arrived quickly and in perfect condition. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rosenstein

customer_reviews.title: I wish I could give this 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and it just works. We are in and out our back door constantly with our 2 dogs and the magnets close it right ups the adhesive is holding perfectly after a couple of months of heavy use. I love that it keeps me from inhaling a cloud of bugs when I let the dogs out at night. I would absolutely recommend this if you don’t have a screen door
customer_reviews.author: Em Vannoy

customer_reviews.title: Fits a little tight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve wore out my last screen. They are great for back doors in cooler weather. My dogs are free to come in and out at will. Bugs don’t come in but fresh air can. It’s like having the outdoors a part of the indoors. This fits a little tight for my door frame. I had to place it on the small rim on my door frame. It’s easy to install but they barely close together. It works now but I’m afraid if there’s any type of wind, these will not remain sealed. Which will defeat the purpose of having them.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Lasted a while!
customer_reviews.text: We had this screen in heavy use for nearly 3 years! It finally lost its magnets, ordering another today! Well worth the purchase. Keeps the bugs and dust particles out of the house.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Second one we’ve bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Magnetic Screen Door we’ve bought from iGotTech. We just got a puppy and here in Wisconsin it’s not a good idea to leave our patio doors open all day. Flying bugs seem to be everywhere. Well, I remembered the screen door we bought back in Southern California for our condo’s bedroom and the ventilation it provided and the insect-stopping side effect. Our puppy, Bella, learned how it works in less than 5 minutes. Now we’re not so worried about “accidents” happening in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Thank god!
customer_reviews.text: We have struggled for several years with open patio doors and flies (we have dogs and cats that come in and out all day.) Last year got two of these. Had to add a strip of wood on the side of our french door due to it's design, but putting the screen door up afterwards was easy. The magnetic strips work well. They have lasted a year with constant ins and out as well as scratches on the doors, etc. I see needing to replace them the end of this summer, as they do have a few snags.
customer_reviews.author: Ali K.

customer_reviews.title: Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second screen door. I wouldn't have had to replace the first one except we had a huge wildfire that destroyed every house in my subdivision and thousands in the city, but ours and one other neighbor's house were okay. The screen burned in several places with little holes from flying burned tree branches and had slight shrinkage from the heat of the fire. I doubt anyone will ever have to put their screen through such a test. I was surprised it didn't melt or catch fire. Can't say the same for our deck, roof and all the furniture on the deck which was destroyed. on the deck. I was surprised the screen even held up at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: great, simple
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this up for a few days, but so far it has been awesome. What is not emphasized enough: the screen shuts magnetically on its own after it's opened. Walk through, look back, ta-da it's closed. Love it! My dog quickly learned to go through it. Seems sturdy. I cleaned the frame of the door with isopropyl alcohol first for better adhesion of the velcro.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: can't you check before you sent it to the customer?
customer_reviews.text: I really needed it and so wanted to have it asap. I was so excited to received it. But as you can see the pic, this screen is defective one. Top of this screen doesn't have any magnetic attached so it is just wide open. What's the point I paid for? All my excitement has been down. My husband said don't believe the reviews too much. So what now?
customer_reviews.author: sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Peeled paint, adhesive peeled off after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this for about 4 months, then the adhesive all came off and showed how it pulled the paint right off our door frame. I want to put another up to cover it but not if it will only last 4 months! This was lightly used, didnt have the sun beating on it, installed under a protected covered porch, so I don't understand why it worked so poorly. It feels like really good quality but the adhesive was trash and the tacks even pulled out as it fell. House is only a couple years old so it isnt like the paint should have peeled like this from age either detaching it.
customer_reviews.author: Primeducky

customer_reviews.title: So Happy With This Purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so glad I purchased this after reading the reviews of other customers. The mosquitos and flies are awful where I live, and my dogs love to go in and out. This magnetic screen has DRASTICALLY cut down on the amount of insects coming into the house. I did leave 12 inches from the bottom of one side not attached to the door frame because one of my dogs was used to walking under my older hanging screen door that did not have the magnetic closure. He walks under it better than pushing through the magnets because of his size. This is one of my FAVORITE purchases from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Takes a beating...
customer_reviews.text: We have this on our back door and it gets used multiple times a day by the pups. We have a dog door on the main door and then the screen so we can leave the door open in the nice weather. The screen takes a beating from the dog door and the dogs themselves. This is our 2nd time purchasing after having the 1st one for 5 years. One of the pups put a hole in the 1st one very early on but the hole never got any bigger until just recently. Considering the cost and the beating it takes, we are VERY happy with the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great this screen!
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen! I'm on my third one in three years. I only seem to get about a year's worth of use from them, but with adults, grandkids and dogs constantly going in and out, it's really not bad. The biggest problem with them not lasting is user error. We have a Lab mix dog and she scratches on the door when she wants in. This doesn't work so well with the screen, she scratches holes in them. We finally got smart and added black shoe strings to each side. We now tie back the screen panels on each side when the door is closed and leave them down when the door is open. No more doggy holes....
customer_reviews.author: Leah B

customer_reviews.title: AWSOME
customer_reviews.text: Actually WORKS Lets animals in and out, keeps bugs and even BIRDS "out" We STAPLED the edges to the wooden frame of our porch . We also wrapped the top around some PVC pipe and screwed IT to the top of the door so bottom didn't drag the floor This is CRITICAL as any friction will keep the magnets from sealing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moran

customer_reviews.title: Nice concept but not durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this because of flow in summer with kids, pool and grill is right out back door. It was easy to set up and product seemed to hold up well first month, not much flow as it’s been just us and our kids with this social distancing haven’t had anyone over. The first issue was when one side came undone at top near seam it would close shut and when it did there was a gap at the top where pests could get in. I sewed it back and worked for an additional week then completely ripped at top and won’t close together. Stitching should be better at seams where there is more pressure.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLeaMell

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy, just not perfect for dog claws.
customer_reviews.text: This screen stayed up about a year and a half. I did use some heavy duty thread and stitch some holes where doggie claws caught it when our dog would "knock" at the door. He did that a LOT and it was probably a year before the first snag. We ultimately took it down because we had to carry him in and out near the end and it was awkward. The adhesive Velcro is still intact (2 years) with the exception of one awkward area where the doorbell is. When it warms up, I'm putting a new one up. May still be able to use the original adhesive Velcro! Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Gerringer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST if you nail it
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best magnetic screen door we have bought! And we've gone through about 4 or 5 different brands over the last few years. The magnet pieces don't extrude from the lining, so the magnet does not fall out in a few months. If you are able to nail it in with the provided nails (I think there should be a few more), I highly recommend doing it that way. We didn't mind using them on our wood. Once the weather got hot our velcro didn't stick to the wood anymore, so it began falling off. That's my only complaint with this net, but using the nails alleviates that issue.
customer_reviews.author: NowTech Productions

customer_reviews.title: Great but absolutely not durable
customer_reviews.text: At first it was really great except for a small part where seams are misaligned at the top. By the end of the summer the Velcro at the top started to come lose leading the screen to remain open unless manually closing it. The material completely bleached on the exposed side and started to decompose. I took it down for winter. It is now spring, the glue is failing, leaving behind a sticky brown mess, some magnets came off the fabric, the screen has just become completely useless
customer_reviews.author: K.

customer_reviews.title: Screen and company are both great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a great product, I have bought 5 and they are the greatest out there, I have ordered others and they do not compare to this product. This last one was a little off from the previous ones, I sent an email and another is on the way, no hassle and no cost to me. They are a great company, they stand behind their products and are fast to respond to any questions you may have. I have recommended this screen to my friends and they have been as happy as I have been with mine.
customer_reviews.author: mompam09

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Been using it for 3 years
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Been using it for 3 years. However, the magnets and spacers in the middle aren't held in with anything so over time they just all slid to the bottom of the screen. Screen is still in good shape, but it is now useless as a screen door since the magnets and spacers are all bunched up on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a traditional screen door.
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for free 7 years ago under a now-defunct reviewer program, and it worked great over those years. Finally, though, the fabric along the edges started to crack, allowing some of the magnets to fall out. Decided to replace it, and since I liked the product, this time I paid for it. Was easier to install this time because I was able to re-use the velcro already on the door frame from the previous installation.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony2816

customer_reviews.title: Best Screen door in market
customer_reviews.text: I have installed them on my rear door and the surfaces are not on same plain more like a inclined installation. 1st day few bottom magnets didn’t close properly thought I may return this one. But next day When I checked they were perfect and closing correctly. It’s been more than 3 weeks and the screen s closing perfectly whenever we use them. Worth the money and I can leave my door open in summer happily now not worrying about bugs. Their customer service also very good and very responsive. If ur looking for screen door this is the one for you and very much worth the money 👌👍
customer_reviews.author: User_Pk

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: It's OKAY but plan on using ALL of the tacts and a few extra small Nails if you them. I used about 6 extra small Nails to hold the screen to the frame because the velcro isn't very strong. Also, the magnets don't really close on their own if there's wind or their slightly away from eachother--not very powerful. I've used other brands where the magnets are very strong but these are just okay.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as original older ones
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this to replace the previous 2 which worked well. Now they are making the screen slightly narrower and with SMALLER MAGNETS. not nearly as effective. Kind of works. But not happy with this product
customer_reviews.author: Leif Aaen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This screen is the best I’ve seen for appearance and effective operation. I just installed it yesterday so cannot comment on durability yet. Love the Velcro. One difficulty was I needed a 34” screen, but this is 36” wide so I had to build an addition to the side of the door frame in order to have full extension of the width of the screen. Once I did that it took maybe 20 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: B. King

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for under $20
customer_reviews.text: For the $$ this is definitely worth it. The home we bought had a gazebo and the door on it was in rough shape. I replaced the door with this screen and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Allysha Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great solution our mosquito issue!
customer_reviews.text: We live in a humid climate with A LOT of bugs, particularly mosquitos. We also have small children so there is a constant struggle to keep the mosquitoes out. This product has been a helpful solution as the thick screen provides as barrier needed, while providing a smaller space to enter the door preventing bug entrance. Our two and four year olds are both able to open and close it with ease. It was easy to install and has held up so far, despite our regular use of the door.
customer_reviews.author: John Davis

customer_reviews.title: Rips easily
customer_reviews.text: After writing a less than stellar review, the company contacted me about the issue. I had purchased two screens at separate times, both ripped in the same place within days of installation. The company sent me a new one. I didn't ask for it. It,too, ripped again in the same place the prior two did. Customer service tried helping, but the product is not as good as their customer service is.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew K.

customer_reviews.title: High quality, but works best for doorways with exact dimensions as the screen.
customer_reviews.text: High quality fabric and love the hook and loop fastener all the way around. Be careful about the size of your door, this is made for exactly the dimensions listed. If your doorway is narrower or shorter, you're going to have bunched up fabric. To best accomodate this, you can cut and sew it to the correct dimensions. Luckily for me, the width was perfect, but the height was about 2 inches too tall, so sewing up the bottom was easy and didn't require any cutting (we just folded up the fabric and made a bottom "sweep" out of it).
customer_reviews.author: ZT

customer_reviews.title: Sizing Way Off
customer_reviews.text: This may be the best magnetic screen going, but I gave it a 2 due to sizing. It clearly stated fits up to 38". This would indicate to me there is an option to fit a smaller opening. My patio door that opens is 34". In order to make this work I would have had to attach it to the glass of the stationery door, which I was unwilling to do. I wanted a magnetic screen that fit the frame of the moveable door. I must say, though, I reached out to customer service and they answered right away that they don't have a screen that will fit my door.
customer_reviews.author: amy smith

customer_reviews.title: Great magnets!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I actually got two seasons out of it. It has heavier gauge fabric, seaming and strong magnets. The magnets are longer and as such, help the fabric to hang smooth and flat. I scrimped at the dollar store on others and they were trashed within a few weeks. Buy these instead!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen door works great for me
customer_reviews.text: I needed a screen door to get fresh air through the back door to my garage and I didn't want to spend much money or go to the trouble of fitting a screen door with latches and hinges. The magnetic screen was fairly easy to install, mostly just peel and stick. I was surprised how well the center magnets line up and stay closed. It lets the air in and keeps the bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Compton

customer_reviews.title: Self closing. Perfect if you have pets-able to go in and outside without getting flies in the house.
customer_reviews.text: Used everyday! We have dogs and cats and like to be able to have the back door open but not get flies in the house. People and animals can just walk through it and it will magnetic ly close/click shut without fuss. We will be repurchasing when this wears out. We have screen doors but put this on our back door because of the ability to close after the animal comes in or out.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy B.

customer_reviews.title: This screen door is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This screen is awesome!! I got it to put on our outdoor workout shed because it gets so warm in there in the summer. This screen lets us keep the door open to allow air flow throughout the area. I should have measured for length prior to purchasing, and will in the future because this is a bit long, but for the location it is fine, we just leave it on the outside of the door so it's no big deal. I would definitely recommend this screen door and will be purchasing additional doors for my house as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered this screen several times before and it usually lasts over a year. However, this last screen started ripping at the top within a few weeks. Which caused it to sag and the dogs would trip on it. They even tore a hole at the bottom from running into the house and getting caught on it. It seems like the quality has gone down on these screens.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Sue

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this screen it's worth every dollar spent
customer_reviews.text: I liked how quick it arrived and I liked how well constructed the screen was made. I noticed it was so much more sturdy than the screen I replaced. It was very easy to set up it only took me 30-45 minutes and that was because I was interrupted. I watched the video and it was a breeze after that. I measured the door frame where my molding was and I applied the velcro and attached the screen to it and it hung perfectly. I didn't have to hem any part of the screen it was a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I preferred 2 of them. My dog loves it. We really got it for him so on nice days he just goes in and out. Durable as he is a Doberman. Screen closes perfectly and it was an easy installation.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't buy again!
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even last it ripped. Once it ripped it wouldn't close. Just took in down and threw it away. Material is not very good for the price i paid. I bought 2 of these. Worst mistake...
customer_reviews.author: BossB

customer_reviews.title: Great Screen/OK Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting screen door I have used. The velcro and backing works great and after 15 months it still holding on strong. Wish I could say the same of the center edges of the screen. Unfortunately those didn't last very long. After 10 months they started showing wear and now I can't keep it on the door as it looks horrible. Guess I have to try and find a more durable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Alex P.

customer_reviews.title: Mine's got a flaw
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a doggy door and it would be perfect but about a 2-inch area near the top is sewn incorrectly near the magnetized closure, which doesn't allow it to close, leaving a gap. Everything else works as it's supposed to with the exception of the adhesion and thumbtacks at the bottom. The paint on my door frame is old and peeled off with the velcro. I'm going to take my heavy-duty staple gun and tack it all into place.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model with just a couple of magnets in the center and wanted something that stayed closed better. This is it. Very happy with it. I did not use the adhesive Velcro around the edges as I've attached it to a wooden frame to be taken down after summer and then put back up in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy M.

customer_reviews.title: Dog Proven Durability
customer_reviews.text: We've had the magnetic screens before but got tired of chasing the magnets around when they fell apart. This one is awesome, felcros to the frame and is reusable the following year, the netting doesn't rip apart after one season of use and the magnets are incased so no more looking for them. If your looking for this type of product look no further. Very pleased...
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation!  Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! I got it yesterday and hung it up in ten minutes or so. It's very easy to install and works like a charm. We don't have any screen doors so it's hard to air the house out without flies and mosquitoes invading the house. This has solved the problem! It fits the door well and the magnets snap together well. I don't know what more I could ask besides easy installation and a product that works effortlessly. I walk through and the little magnets snap themselves together behind me! Brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: liane

customer_reviews.title: I really did not believe it would work but it does!
customer_reviews.text: So we would have to do a custom order of a screen door for our house and with short summers it does not seem like a worth while investment. I saw this screen setup on Amazon and thought I doubt it but for the price I will try it. Well shocked me, it works beautifully and I am so happy with it. Had to adjust a couple of magnets in the liner which was just small pinch and slide and closes itself every time. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Rock

customer_reviews.title: Great for letting a breeze into the house!
customer_reviews.text: This screen door works exactly as expected. I suggest you follow the instructions carefully and do a lot of fit testing along the way to ensure it will close automatically, by making sure the material is not too tight. I would caution everyone this product is not good for keeping pets inside the house. My cat was immediately interested in finding a way to sneak out the bottom of the screen, so I have to invent a barrier on my own to prevent this from happening. Otherwise, this is a great addition to allow the warm summer breeze into my home. Highly recommended! Easy to take down in the cooler months.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money, won't last long and will ruin paint.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first, it was so convenient to leave the door open on nice days with out getting bugs in the house. That did not last very long though, after just one week we had a hole in the top of the net somehow. Then a few days later it ripped where the tacks held it in and it was all downhill from there. I tried to take it down and it started peeling my trim paint off!
customer_reviews.author: Helen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic durability and easy installation
customer_reviews.text: Installed this as a door for the breezeway. Easy to install. I used the accompanying tracks along the top as well. BUT...Great news! We had a direct hit from a Category 2 Hurricane with 80 MPH sustained winds that were coming directly at it and it held perfectly. The magnet closures didn't even open except in 90 MPH gusts. We absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shoshana Savion

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this screen better than the cheaper versions.. Only lasts one or 2 seasons because of my large dogs. They rip a hole in it or scratch it cannot be avoided . But keeps the bees and stink bugs out of the house. I had to put a piece of wood and drill the top in the door so it would hold or the dogs would pull it down . Since then works great and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Brackett

customer_reviews.title: This thing is very easy to put up and great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really great it's very easy to put up very easy to open and close if I had to complain about something on this my main issue is on my door it's maybe an inch too short and when the magnets click back together sometimes it's very loud and hurts my ears other than that for keeping bugs and all that other stuff out it's great and it's very easy for one person to hang up takes maybe a hole 10-15 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Chief_Bird

customer_reviews.title: It works great!
customer_reviews.text: So I really needed a screen for my patio and looked around for a screen door but they were too expensive and too much trouble to install. when I saw this I was a little worried, to be honest, but thought what the heck lets give it a try. It was a snap to put up and its a great item it closes after you go outside with magnets and is even strong enough to keep the cat in or maybe he's just too scared of it, either way, I love it. It works great and keeps the flies out of my house and lets the breeze come in.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca Villardi

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service response
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for our house a couple of years ago. One of the screens (which got the most traffic by far) started to tear at the stress point at the top center - rough kids and rougher pets. I contacted customer service about the warranty and I had a new screen two days later. I don't really expect these to last forever, especially given regular use, but the warranty service makes this worth-while. Tha screens work great too.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: The Best Screen I Have Ever Bought
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these types of screens for my French Door leading out to my deck, I have two small dogs that go in and out most of the day. This is by far the best I have found. It was so easy to install, I am 64 and did this all by myself. It is well worth the extra cost for the quality and the ease of installation. Not to mention there are no gaps because of the magnets are designed to keep it closed with out the gaps as with other less expensive screens.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine Dalton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. (Buy extra thumbtacks).
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Make sure you pick up a few extra thumbtacks in advance of delivery, as the supplied tacks are pr tty flimsy, and brass-colored, which makes them visible... so... use a sharpie. Otherwise, it was installed in 15 minutes, and once the fabric relaxes a bit, works as advertised. The magnets are pretty strong.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great screen/ net
customer_reviews.text: We love these screens! We live in hot, North Texas but our back door is almost always open because of my toddler that tries to live outside. Our other net developed a tear in it somehow after a little over a year (not too bad for daily use). So we went without a screen for about 2 weeks. And it sucked. Flies in the house. Ew. We put this new one up as soon as it came in the mail & it's been great so far! Closes well & is still see through. We love these things & wouldn't do a summer without them!
customer_reviews.author: MDS

customer_reviews.title: awful
customer_reviews.text: The magnets were next to nothing as far as strength. overall cheap product. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Iordereverythingonamazon

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: After having been through a number of these sorts of screens (purchased at local hardware stores, Home Depot, etc.) my hopes weren't extremely high. In the past I've found the magnets to be weak, the screens to be flimsy, and the tape or tacks holding them up to be unreliable. This Magnetic Screen Door threw all those concerns out the window! It's thicker than others I have owned, the mounts sturdy in all sorts of weather, and the magnets quite strong (they snap right back into place as you'd hope they would). 100% recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M. Brookes

customer_reviews.title: This one will last, you need to buy this ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this screen! I have it on my sliding glass door. It awesome, the dogs can come & go. I’ve had my first one for 2 years now, and it’s still going strong. My dad wanted one like ours b/c he had a different brand & it’s falling apart. He demanded to know more info on my igotech screen so I ordered him one for Father’s Day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mother of two

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and worth every penny! We love it more than our screen door especially since our toddler goes in and out every minute. Easy to install and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Tina McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Great value product!
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted to find a way to have a screen door in my condo, and this product did just that. Its lightweight and easy to set up. I really found it easy to install and it makes a big difference in terms of having a cheaper option then buying a screen door. Im even considering taking it to the cabin for camping. It's a great, easy to use product.
customer_reviews.author: Bill San Filippo

customer_reviews.title: Product works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering an 80-100 dollar option, and I am so glad I went with this instead. The screen easily unclasps when you walk through and the magnets catch pretty easily to close the screen back up. The instructions are clear, and installation is easy and intuitive. The screen works great and adheres to the door frame well
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SCREEN DOOR
customer_reviews.text: absolutely amazing product ! I got this because my back door is always open therefore there is a lot of flys and I do have a dog so I need to be opening the door a lot . This screen door is strong and sturdy it works perfectly to keep bugs out and if my dog ever needs to go she can just push it and it will open and close after her. Totally recommend this product for anyone and any door.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: iGotTech stands behind this product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and were disappointed. iGotTech read the negative feedback and emailed us with an offer to replace at no charge. We took them up on it. The replacement couldn't be much worse and if it was we still had the first one that kind of worked. WOW! What a difference! The replacement was exactly what were hoping for when we made purchase. It works great. Installed easily, fits well, and looks great. The factory needs to improve product consistency, but when they get it right it is good. Most importantly, iGotTech stands behind the product when they don't get it right.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn and Carol

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our doorway
customer_reviews.text: We have this set up in the doorway that separates the house from the garage. We like to keep the door open at times for air flow, but didn't want flies coming in. This is perfect for that purpose. Installation was easy. I guess one person could install it themselves, but I'm a little on the short side so I needed assitance.
customer_reviews.author: flo

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: This was so much better than expected! It looked like it was going to be annoying to set up so I almost didn't bother but it was way simpler than I thought. It was up in no time. A few adjustments by velcroing and un-velcroing and it was just right. We didn't want to replace our screen door (again) until the kids were older and wouldn't forget to open so we just put this on the frame of the screen door and it was perfect. Now we can leave the door open to get fresh air while keeping bugs out! Just in time for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: skimom

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Durable
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fits perfectly to our front door, set up was extremely simple as I did it myself took less that 10 mins, the magnets are great they automatically close back together each time you go through the screen. It’s extremely durable as I have a dog that just launches herself through the screen each time lol so it works! Because of how great the magnets are I dint have to worry about bugs getting in because everything is completely sealed. We will definitely purchase again for the other two doors!
customer_reviews.author: Twilliams28

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bugs out!
customer_reviews.text: We use this on our RV entrance door. It says that it is easy to install. Make sure you get the proper width...it makes all the difference for installation. Took some time and trial and error to get it adjusted to where it worked properly. We like the ability to not have to open and close the screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are sewn right into fabric
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered many different magnetic screens over the years. I use it for a dog door for my 180 lb Mastiff and 2 other dogs. Most don’t last long with the magnets coming off or the screen ripping. This one though is the best though - I especially love that the magnets are sewn into the fabric. I’ve had this magnetic screen up for 2 years now and there is very minimal ripping at the very top due to the dogs flying out the door all summer. I just received my new one and put it up with ease in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jane dowdy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and super effective
customer_reviews.text: Excellent material and the magnets snap right together without much effort at all. It’s great when you have a kid who can’t decide if they want to be in or out! The installation is easy but we did decide to use a different hook and loop system rather than the provided velcro but that was a personal choice.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Simple solution to keep flies out the house!
customer_reviews.text: The setup for this product was easy, you clean the door frame and make sure it fits. After checking that it fits, lay it down and put the hook tape on the top and sides, cutting the ends as needed. Once it's on the door just test it by walking past it and both sides should touch and the magnets close the screen door. Works for letting in some light, but not the bugs!
customer_reviews.author: Derron Ford

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third screen for out back sliding door as I have two giant shepherds and when they come running in and out, they end up tearing the screen with their nails. This screen has been on for a few months now, and only one little tear! I feel this screen is worth the money for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Edina D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great to keep the flies out!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that when my kids go in an out to the patio and leave the door open I won't have flies swarming in. This definitely did the job! It works great - they walk in and out and the magnets just instantly snap shut behind them. I love this and hope it lasts a long time as it seems it will.
customer_reviews.author: FB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if you don't have a screen door
customer_reviews.text: This magnetic screen door works great. I'm usually in and out the door with my hands full of drinks, food or kids and it opens easily and closes behind me. I'm now able to sit in the sun room and still hear the kids playing in the pool without getting eaten alive by mosquitos. Lol. Highly recommended if you're looking for an inexpensive option to a screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Carter

customer_reviews.title: Quality choice among many similar products.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this screen to replace a similar one I used to have. The old one worked well so I looked for a replacement - LOT's of similar products. I was lucky to choose this one. Much better quality than the previous and works even better. Magnets are sewn into the length of the closing seams and close virtually silently (The old one clicked). Closure is totally reliable. Full length Velcro strips with 3M adhesive. I fitted this before a big BBQ and not only did it stand up to 40+ people after the drinks were flowing, it also got a lot of compliments - so, credit where it's due - you won't be disappointed - I certainly wasn't!
customer_reviews.author: Vince O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It took me a little while to install because the top middle didn’t fully close. I will change my rating to five stars if the company has better instructions of how to install the top middle. After fiddling with it a bit, I was able to get it to work. Other than that, it works great! My family (and the dogs) love it!
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great screen door
customer_reviews.text: We had a cheap screen up, that did not work. This screen is awesome! It is easy to go through, automatically shuts behind you, and totally keeps the bugs out. With our old screen, the mosquito eaters somehow managed to find a way in, and we had more mosquito eaters than we knew what to do with. My husband and son would go on a hunt every night, leaving behind carcasses in their wake. And guess who had to pick up those carcasses? That's right, me. And the mosquito eaters didn't even bother me in the first place. So I had to find something that worked, and this product was it. It really is the #1 best screen!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this $20 screen, installed it in less than 5 minutes. The velcro is holding well to the wood, and the magnets are pulling back together strong. My opening is a couple inches narrower, but it was straightforward to pinch the velcro a little and it still hangs pretty straight. My door is 2 inches longer, so I added a couple inches of black canvas to the bottom. Don't feel the need to add any weight to the bottom. Will be interesting to see how it holds up after the 1st rain storm.
customer_reviews.author: FSS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly except for one thing.... I live in a pre-manufactured home so there are metal doors and metal porch railing....get the picture? Definitely not made with metal doors in mind but still works great! I can have the back door open and have no bugs whatsoever! So glad I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn L. Bergholt

customer_reviews.title: Very good screen door
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install; it's nice that it has lots of velcro around the doorframe; good also that it includes tacks, because a worker split the doorframe edge to get a water heater through so the tacks put it all back together again!. We have a metal door onto a rear deck, and the magnets stick to it, so we just need to be careful to unstick it so the flies don't enter! Works great. We've had it for at least 6 months now, and it's holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: SandrC

customer_reviews.title: Best screen door
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it works great. when the weather is good, I leave the back door open and the fur child can go in and out as he pleases without me having to get up every time (and he does love going in and out, and in, and out. Really helps keep the bugs on the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice, order once... Seriously.
customer_reviews.text: Silly me for thinking all door ways were the same size? Lol either way, it doesnt fit like it should but im not sending it back. I bought it to be able to have my glass door open so the cat could get some fresh air..doesnt really work for that purpose.. He can easily get out. Either way, measure twice order once is soo legit. Works to keep bugs out and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Keeley burch

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to allow my dogs easy access to the deck. The male was a little hesitant but the female ran right thru it once she figure it was easy access. When it arrived my daughter installed it with ease...great product and looks great installed!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Butler

product_meta.title: iGotTech Magnetic Screen Door, Full Frame Seal. Covers Doors up to 34 x 82 Inches MAX. (Item Size: 36 x 83)
product_meta.description:
"MEASURE TWICE, ORDER ONCE!">> Fits doors UP TO 34" x 82" MAX. 

1) MAGNETIC SCREEN DOOR NIRVANA. If you've tried other flimsy magnetic screen doors before, you'll notice the difference right away. #1 Best Screen has toughest, heavy mesh construction. Mosquitos and biting bugs stand no chance. 

2) PUTTING THE MAGNETIC MAGIC BACK INTO MAGIC MESH SCREEN DOORS. #1 Best Screen has the full 83" height stacked with 26 powerful magnets - BURIED in the reinforced adjoining edges, so they'll never break or fall off. NO GAPS along the entire vertical closure = No bugs. 

3) THE "HOOK & LOOP MILE". The ENTIRE FRAME of iGotTech's #1 Best Screen is lined with a reinforced hook & loop seal. NO OTHER screen door offers this. With the super-duty hook & loop seal around EVERY inch along the top and both sides, and additional support nails included, there's NO chance of this screen falling down, and NO chance of bugs. 

4) KILLER VIDEO TUTORIAL. iGotTech's Creative Department fails us not. See directions in package to view instruction tutorial, ensuring you get your #1 Best Screen quickly installed right the first time, to maximize bug-free bliss. 

5) OUR FAMOUS "BUGS-NOT-INVITED" CONSTRUCTION GUARANTEE. If our #1 Best Screen construction quality, or anything about our product is not up to par: WE WANT TO KNOW. Our Top Priority is your satisfaction, and stand behind our products 100%. That means if you dot like it, you can return it for a FULL refund, no questions asked. Simple as that! You literally RISK NOTHING trying this Premium Product Today. 

> Get 1 Screen for the Front Door & 1 for the Back, Side, Sliding, or Side Garage Door!



>> Click that yellow "ADD TO CART" BUTTON NOW to get YOUR Bug-Free-Bliss On while these Screens are Still in Stock!
feature_bullets: 1) MAGNETIC SCREEN DOOR WILL COVER DOORS UP TO 34"x82" MAX (Item size including doorframe-overlap seal: 36 x 83)
2) STACKED WITH 26 POWERFUL MAGNETS, SEWN in the reinforced edges. Never Breaks and No Gaps.
3) THE "HOOK & LOOP MILE". The ENTIRE FRAME is lined with Super-Duty, Reinforced hook & loop seal along EVERY inch.
4) KILLER VIDEO TUTORIAL. Ensures you get your Screen quickly installed right the first time.
Read: There NEEDS to be a 1" overlap OVER the door opening to attach the hook & loop seal. BUGS NOT INVITED!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars5,461 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
